episodes.title: Universal Medicine Cult
episodes.description: Universal Medicine is a controversial healing “movement” led by Serge Benhayon that's raised eyebrows worldwide. What started in Australia has spiraled into a global network, blending unproven practices with questionable beliefs. But behind the spiritual talk, some say there's a darker side. With claims of energy healing, past-life karma, and even bizarre, and I DO mean bizarre, treatments, the group has been accused of being a cult. Spoiler alert: it’s a cult. Stick around as we dig into Universal Medicine—its rise, its followers, and the scandal that just won't go away.
